title: Search Intensifies Near Prison For Escaped Prisoners
teaser: Police searching for two escaped prisoners are now going door to door in Cadyville, New York, a few miles from the prison.
contentencoded:
Police searching for two escaped prisoners are now going door to door in Cadyville, New York, a few miles from the Clinton Correctional Facility where prisoners Richard Matt and David Sweat escaped over the weekend.

Bloodhounds have reportedly picked up a scent nearby. Brian Mann, Adirondack bureau chief for Here & Now contributor North Country Public Radio, says police are indicating this is the strongest lead they’ve had so far.

Yesterday, officials expanded the search to Vermont.

Guest

  • Brian Mann, Adirondack bureau chief for North Country Public Radio. He tweets @BrianMannADK.
